query:
ALTER TABLE social_posts 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS userId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS postType ENUM('ALL_CLEAR','MONITORING','ACTIVE_STORM','WEATHER_UPDATE','GAME_DAY','COMMUNITY_EVENT','LOCAL_TREND','SEASONAL','MANUAL') DEFAULT 'MANUAL' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS triggerContext ENUM('weather_storm','weather_clear','weather_extreme','sports_event','community_event','local_trend','seasonal','manual') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'manual',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reasonChips JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS whyWeWroteThis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS suggestedAlts JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS confidenceScore INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS decisionReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS weatherData JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoApproveType BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS imageUrl VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS publishedTo JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS facebookPostId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS scheduledFor DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS expiresAt DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS approvedAt DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS approvedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS publishedAt DATETIME;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2E4HaJUB1R41J12.fcd4ff42607d --database H86jcAdP392wwbWXRcEDMs --execute ALTER TABLE social_posts 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS userId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS postType ENUM('ALL_CLEAR','MONITORING','ACTIVE_STORM','WEATHER_UPDATE','GAME_DAY','COMMUNITY_EVENT','LOCAL_TREND','SEASONAL','MANUAL') DEFAULT 'MANUAL' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS triggerContext ENUM('weather_storm','weather_clear','weather_extreme','sports_event','community_event','local_trend','seasonal','manual') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'manual',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reasonChips JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS whyWeWroteThis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS suggestedAlts JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS confidenceScore INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS decisionReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS weatherData JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS autoApproveType BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS imageUrl VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS publishedTo JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS facebookPostId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS scheduledFor DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS expiresAt DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS approvedAt DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS approvedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS publishedAt DATETIME;
